about_the_game:
Cinderella Escape2 Theme Song OST. - Snow White feat. Meilun

The melody was well made by LeeTingChou who has ever made Official Demo Song for a famous virtual singer, 夏語遙(Xia Yu Yao), in Taiwan.
And Meilun's voice is so amazing and makes the song perfect.

It's OK to cover this song for non-commercial use.
If you like this song, please support them. Thank you very much.

After downloading this DLC, you'll find a folder named "CE2OST" in the game folder.
This DLC contains 2 MP3 files.
  • Snow_White.mp3
  • Snow_White_Instrumental.mp3

Cinderella Escape2 Theme Song OST. - Snow White feat. Meilun

The melody was well made by LeeTingChou who has ever made Official Demo Song for a famous virtual singer, 夏語遙(Xia Yu Yao), in Taiwan.

If you like this song, please support them. Thank you very much.
